mapper.update:
UPDATE OM_DUTY
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
duty_code = #{duty_code,jdbcType=varchar},
duty_name = #{duty_name,jdbcType=varchar},
duty_type = #{duty_type,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_parents = #{guid_parents,jdbcType=varchar},
isleaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=char},
sub_count = #{sub_count,jdbcType=decimal},
duty_level = #{duty_level,jdbcType=decimal},
duty_seq = #{duty_seq,jdbcType=varchar},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=varchar}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
